title: Alignment
pickOne: **Chaotic** - Leap into danger without a plan.
**Neutral** - Avoid detection or infiltrate a location.
**Evil** - Shift danger or blame from yourself to someone else.

title: Race
pickOne: Halfling - When you **attack with a ranged weapon** deal +2 damage.
Human - You are a professional.  When you **Spout Lore** or **Discern Realities** about criminal activities, **take +1**.

title: Trap Expert (+DEX)
description: When you **spend a moment to survey a dangerous area**, roll+DEX.

outcomes.text: Hold 3. Spend your hold as you walk through the area to ask these questions:
bullets: Is there a trap here and if so, what activates it?
What does the trap do when activated?

title: Flexible Morals
description: When **someone tries to detect your alignment** you can tell them any alignment you like.

title: Tricks Of The Trade (+DEX)
description: When you **pick locks or pockets or disable traps**, roll+DEX.

outcomes.text: You still do it, but the GM will offer you two options between suspicion, danger, or cost.

title: Backstab (+DEX)
description: When you **attack a surprised or defenseless enemy with a melee weapon**, you can choose to deal your damage or roll+DEX.

bullets: You don't get into melee with them
You create an advantage, **+1 forward** to you or an ally acting on it
Reduce their armor by 1 until they repair it

title: Poisoner
description: You've mastered the care and use of a poison. Choose a poison from the list below; that poison is no longer dangerous for you to use. You also start with three uses of the poison you choose. Whenever you have time to gather materials and a safe place to brew you can make three uses of the poison you choose for free. Note that some poisons are **applied**, meaning you have to carefully apply it to the target or something they eat or drink. **Touch** poisons just need to touch the target, they can even be used on the blade of a weapon.
pickOne: Oil of Tagit - **(applied)** The target falls into a light sleep.
Bloodweed - **(touch)** The target deals -1d4 damage ongoing until cured.
Goldenroot - **(applied)** The target treats the next creature they see as a trusted ally, until proved otherwise.
Serpent's Tears - **(touch)** Anyone dealing damage to the target rolls twice and takes the better result.

title: Cheap Shot
description: When using a **precise** or **hand** weapon, your **Backstab** deals an extra +1d6 damage.

title: Cautious
description: When you use **Trap Expert** you always get +1 hold, even on a 6-.

title: Wealth And Taste
description: When you **make a show of flashing around your most valuable possession**, choose someone present. They will do anything they can to obtain your item or one like it.

title: Shoot First
description: You're never caught by surprise. When an enemy would get the drop on you, you get to act first instead.

title: Underdog
description: When you're outnumbered, you have +1 armor.

title: Poison Master
description: After you've **used a poison once** it's no longer dangerous for you to use.

title: Envenom
description: You can apply even complex poisons with a pinprick. When you **apply a poison** that's not dangerous for you to use to your weapon it's **touch** instead of **applied**.

title: Brewer
description: When you **have time to gather materials and a safe place to brew** you can create three doses of any one poison you've used before.

title: Connections (+CHA)
description: When you **put out word to the criminal underbelly about something you want or need**, roll+CHA.

outcomes.text: Someone has it, just for you.
You'll have to settle for something close or it comes with strings attached, your call.

title: Dirty Fighter (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Cheap Shot**

When using a **precise** or **hand** weapon, your **Backstab** deals an extra +1d8 damage and all other attacks deal +1d4 damage.

title: Extremely Cautious (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Cautious**

When you use **Trap Expert** you always get +1 hold, even on a 6-. On a 12+ you get 3 hold and the next time you come near a trap the GM will immediately tell you what it does, what triggers it, who set it, and how you can use it to your advantage.

title: Serious Underdog (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Underdog**

You have +1 armor. When you're outnumbered, you have +2 armor instead.

title: Evasion (Requires level 6+)
description: When you **Defy Danger** on a 12+, you transcend the danger. You not only do what you set out to, but the GM will offer you a better outcome, true beauty, or a moment of grace.

title: Heist (Requires level 6+)
description: When you **take time to make a plan to steal something**, name the thing you want to steal and ask the GM these questions. When acting on the answers you and your allies take **+1 forward**.

title: Alchemist (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Brewer**

When you **have time to gather materials and a safe place to brew** you can create three doses of any poison you've used before. Alternately you can describe the effects of a poison you'd like to create. The GM will tell you that you can create it, but with one or more caveats:

bullets: It will only work under specific circumstances
The best you can manage is a weaker version
It'll take a while to take effect

title: Escape Route (+DEX) (Requires level 6+)
description: When you're **in too deep and need a way out**, name your escape route and roll+DEX.

outcomes.text: You can stay or go, but if you go it costs you: leave something behind or take something with you, the GM will tell you what.

title: Disguise (Requires level 6+)
description: When you **have time and materials** you can create a disguise that will fool anyone into thinking you're another creature of about the same size and shape. Your actions can give you away but your appearance won't.

title: Strong Arm, True Aim (Requires level 6+)
description: You can throw any melee weapon, using it to **Volley**. A thrown melee weapon is gone; you can never choose to reduce ammo on a 7-9.
